page.title: 06RUDDINGTON SPORTS FACILITIES
page.content: In{RUDDINGTON}there are many different sports clubssuch as {Football, Bowls, {Athletics, Boxing, Tennis, Badminton. Some of them practice in{ELMS PARK}and some meet in the {VILLAGE HALL. } My name is Louise Kenton and I go to the Athletic Club.You can do lots of things such as high and long jump, hurdles,discus and shot putt.You can go running round the track and do exercises.You can buy Sports clothes like track suits and spikes from Mrs. Sayers. It costs just three pounds to be a member.Its on Tuesdays from 5.45p.m. to 7.00p.m. and on Sundays from 10.00a.m. to 11.14a.m. I enjoy the high jump and the long jump most of all. { There are indoor sports available at the{Youth Club}which is held in their building on the{GREEN}on weekday evenings.
